Name: Hue
About the game: Hue is a vibrant, award-winning puzzle-adventure, where you alter the world by changing its background colour. You explore a dangerous grey land, unearthing coloured fragments on a journey to find your missing mother. As obstacles match the background, they disappear, creating new and exciting puzzles - full of peril, mystery… and colours unseen. Key Features Unique colour-matching mechanic, offering a new twist on the classic adventure game. A heartfelt story that touches on themes of love, loss, existence and remorse. A world full of lively characters to talk to, each with their own personality and story. Stark silhouetted art style with bright, bold colours. Over 30 original music tracks, composed exclusively for Hue. Professionally voiced narration by Anna Acton and Matthew Wade, some of the UK’s best television talent. Full colourblind support, using symbols as a colour aid. Razer Chroma, Corsair RGB plus many more coloured LED devices supported on Windows.
